Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Danny Jackson (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1985, off Mike Moore (SEA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1985, hitting .350 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
8/31/1985: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $5,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1985...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/7/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $4,230,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/1989, hitting .471 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
8/19/1990: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $570,000 per year, for 2 years.
Released by Toronto on 10/16/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/6/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1993 to a minor league contract.
